title: Corrupt Justice

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Observe two players. If any attackers visit either of them, they will instead be redirected to attack you.
- Empower a player. If they make an attack tonight, they also make a second one with an  attack value one higher on the same target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have invincible defence against attacks from evil roles, but none against attacks from good roles.
- Every time you are attacked, the attacker will gain an extra anonymous vote for the following day. The majority required will also change.
- You will know the roles of all players who attack you.
- You may only use one ability per night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the town lose.

desc:
Post 256
*Once a pillar of justice, the embodiment of law and order. Those days were so long ago.*
